Intervention: Carboplatin: IV, weekly for 6 weeks, AUC 2.0

3D-RT or IMRT: from week 2 to week 4 in the treatment of 6 weeks of carboplatin: whole Breast 3D-RT or IMRT at 2.7 Gy X 15 fractions (5 times/wk x 3 wks=40.50 Gy), then on the second and third Friday, 3 Gy in tumour bed only X 2 fractions, total dose in tumour bed = 46.5 Gy
Eligibility: Pre- and post-menopausal women with Stage I and II breast cancer, triple negative tumours
Invasive breast cancer proven by biopsy, excised with negative margins of at least 1 mm
· Situation after segmental mastectomy, biopsy of sentinel nodes and/or dissection of axillary nodes ( tumores < 5 mm do not require nodal evaluation) or after mastectomy
The patient must be able to understand and demonstrate his or her willingness to sign a written informed consent document.
Previous radiotherapy in the ipsilateral breast
- connective tissue disorders, such as lupus or sclerodermia
Results: Number of patients who developed Grade 2-3 acute radiation dermatitis within 60 days of TR
